p: We examined five RNA virus families ( Picornaviridae, Flaviviridae, Togaviridae, Orthomyxoviridae, Reoviridae, and Paramyxoviridae) and 1 DNA virus family, i. e. Herpesviridae in our efforts to develop a universal cell line. All of these viruses were tested in Vero cell and HEp-2 cell lines that were targeted by siRNA to KD the top 6 gene hits ( Table 3).
